author: talkSPORT
description: Manchester City moved up to third in the Premier League with a comfortable 3-1 win over West Brom on an emotional night at the Etihad Stadium. Goals from Gabriel Jesus, Kevin De Bruyne and Yaya Toure saw City cruise to victory on Pablo Zabaleta's final home appearance for the club. West Brom were outplayed but claimed a late consolation through substitute Hal Robson-Kanu.
title: Manchester City 3-1 West Brom: Citizens secure resounding win in Pablo Zabaleta's send-off

author: FourFourTwo
description: Having announced he will be leaving Manchester City, Pablo Zabaleta is attracting interest from the Premier League and abroad.
title: Zabaleta has Premier League offers as City finale nears

author: FourFourTwo
description: As Manchester City's fans acclaimed Pablo Zabaleta, manager Pep Guardiola hailed his compatriot Sergio Aguero for taking down West Brom.
title: Aguero the main man for Guardiola as Manchester City shine

author: FourFourTwo
description: Manchester City gave Pablo Zabaleta a hero's send off as a 3-1 win over West Brom all-but secured a Champions League return next season.
title: Emotional Zabaleta proud of 'wonderful nine years' at Manchester City

author: BBC Sport
description: Departing defender Pablo Zabaleta says the send off given to him by the Manchester City fans after the club's 3-1 Premier League win over west Brom "will stay with me forever".
title: Manchester City 3-1 West Brom: Send off 'will stay with me forever' - Zabaleta
